name: Veritas
description: Veritas is an AI security protocol for autonomous vulnerability detection and self-healing smart contracts. Built on custom-trained AI and multi-agent framework infrastructure, it finds and fixes vulnerabilities in real-time, brings high-end security to early-stage projects at minimal cost and backs everything with full insurance coverage against attacks. Veritas Explorer for users provides token health analysis, smart contract trust scores, powerful yet simple forensic tools, rug pull detection, phishing identification, digital footprint verification, real-time incident reports, and urgent victim support. Smart Audit tool for projects delivers automated security audits with assessment reports, bug fix recommendations, and soulbound tokens as on-chain proof of audits. Projects that achieve high security scores can qualify for optional insurance against exploits.
